title: client keep disconnecting
body: so yeah...after i had problems with the chat client that got fixed with the Hextech Repair Tool now i have problems with the game client, the client disconnecting every 3mins or so (internet still working), i tried to fix it with the Hetech repair tool and nothing, all my ports are open and i tried to repair using the normal tool, logs showing all is fine, any idea ?

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your connection is unstable to the server. Since this is most often caused by a problematic local configuration, a good place to start is by trying the steps inside our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to disconnect.
well, i tied everything and i get dc every 3-4 minutes

It sounds like we'll need to investigate much deeper to find the solution, then. I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, it will give our techs the context necessary to resolve this for good.
